long_description: The Smartwool Light Hiking socks for girls are made with top-grade, odor-fighting merino wool. They stay soft and maintain their fit even after multiple seasons. Made with merino wool and nylon to absorb and wick moisture away from feet, keeping them dry and cool in summer, warm in winter. Spandex in rib-knit uppers keeps socks in place; arch brace is knit with Lycra(R) spandex for added support and comfort. Light-density, terry-loop padding provides a soft, cushioned fit for comfort on the trail. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Smartwool Light Hiking socks for girls are made with top-grade, odor-fighting merino wool. They stay soft and maintain their fit even after multiple seasons.
